name: The Spirit Within™ Note Card
description:
The image that started it all! Catch the wave storming across the continent in a note card to share or frame! High quality art...just tinier!

Pocket-sized art with more uses than you can wave a Bic at. Birthdays, thanks yous, Valentines or even Wednesdays, there’s always an occasion for a stunning card. Our cards are more versatile than Optimus Prime.

Superior writing surface for your words of wisdom

300gsm card with a satin finish

Greeting cards supplied with cellophane sleeves and envelope


Standard Greeting Card - 100 x 150mm / 4” x 6”

Option upgrade to:

Large Greeting Card - 125 x 190 mm / 5” x 7.5”- $5.00 Perfect for larger frames.

Postcard - 100 x 150mm / 4” x 6” Better for framing and a little less expensive than a greeting card if you are mailing or framing:) $2.50

options.name: Standard Greeting Card-envelope and sleeve- 100mm x 150mm/4" x 6"
Large-envelope and sleeve125 x 190 mm/5" x 7.5"-$5.00
Postcard-no envelope or sleeve -100 x 150mm / 4” x 6”

name: The Spirit Within™ Fabric Print-24" X 36" x 2" Finished, Stretcher Bar Frame Ready to hang!
description:
The image that started it all! Grab a fantastic fabric print of The Spirit Within™ on fabric not canvas that catches the light and will not fade! Fire resistant in all it's glory! A beautiful conversation piece that will last a lifetime or two! To view in person before you buy come see the real thing hanging as part of Liane Pinel's solo exhibition at Anna's Cafe Europa on Main Street in Airdrie, Alberta. Have a wrap and enjoy the view!

 Other sizes are available as well...contact for info if your size isn't listed!

 This piece is ready to hang stretched over a 2" deep stretcher bar frame. More expensive to ship but it is all done. See options for unfinished pieces that you can stretch or frame yourself for less! Since the pieces are available really really big shipping is astronomical so I suggest you purchase the fabric print only for large pieces and have your local framer do the stretching on a 1.75" stretcher bar frame for you!

options.name: 24" x 36" x 2" Finished stretcher bar framed and ready to hang
8" x 10" Print on Fabric only-no stretcher bar frame-Frame Yourself at any frame shop!
